workflow.meta: Fixed Failed QC going to the wrong state

action.name: Failed QC
action.meta: The sample failed the QC tests and will not be processed further

action.name: Deprecated
action.meta: If the samples originally submitted have a problem, such as duplicate samples, empty samples, externally contaminated samples, then the sample should be moved to [Deprecated]. Note: Deprecated samples are ignored when producing statistics

action.name: Unresolved
action.meta: If a sample is not [Deprecated] but still unsuitable for publishing to should be moved to [Unresolved]

action.name: Submitted to GenBank
action.meta: Non-Influenza samples. If there is no wait period then the Batch can be submitted once the annotation has been generated. If there is a wait period then the Batch can be submitted once the wait period has passed.

action.name: Move
action.meta: For use when a sample needs to be moved between two steps and there is no path. Move first to this step and then from this step to the target step. This is only available to members of the viral-admin group

action.name: Deliver Data
Collaborator Review
action.meta: Flu (with or without wait period) Automatic

action.name: Deliver Data
action.meta: When the wait period for collaborator review has passed; continue to 'Deliver Data'

action.name: Auto Setup
action.meta: This is an automatic step used to setup the GLK jira parameters. A seperate step is required to the creation step so that the issue has been indexed and its values can be accessed.

step.name: Move the Sample to another Step
